comments:
Build I20040225
Windows XP; Sun JDK 1.4.2 ; default vm args

I'm running out of memory more quickly than I did on builds from
a couple of weeks back.

I used preferences to set my machine as slow.
I then reopened my existing workspace. When I attempted to open
one large Java source file, I got an out of memory error. 
Here is the log:

Adding Philippe to CC since the OutOfMemoryErrors are coming from the JDT
indexing thread. The NPE during indexer shutdown is likely a side-effect of the
OOM too.

We have addressed some memory growth with a few 'fixes' today. See bug 53242.

But the OOM problems with the indexer would show up shortly after startup, not 
later in the session if you're just changing individual source files.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 53242 ***
